target: No me gasté ni un chavo.

source: I think we'll make it if we hurry.
target: Si nos apuramos, creo que la hacemos.

source: Tom didn't know that you didn't know Mary.
target: Tom no sabía que no conocías a Mary.

source: They gave up.
Tom has killed again.
When did it stop raining?
Tom really admired Mary's courage.
target: Tom realmente admiraba el valor de Mary.

source: I let go of the rope.
You will soon come to like this town.
It's on fire.
Things are different now.
Talking is one thing, doing is another.
target: Del dicho al hecho hay mucho trecho.

source: Don't you like it?
Where is the bathroom?
They're a good team.
What is today's date?
Please do it this way.
target: Por favor, hacelo de esta manera.

source: I didn't see Tom on Monday.
target: No vi a Tom el lunes.

source: What's there to eat?
All the dogs are alive.
Tom couldn't attend the meeting because of a previous engagement.
target: Tom no pudo asistir a la reunión por un compromiso previo.

source: Can you ride a bicycle?
Please turn on the radio.
They abandoned their children in the forest.
target: Abandonaron a sus hijos en el bosque.

source: I can give you medication for the pain.
target: Te puedo dar medicina para el dolor.

source: If I'd known it, I'd have told you.
target: Si lo hubiera sabido, te lo habría dicho.

source: How often do you wash your clothes?
target: ¿Con qué frecuencia te lavas la ropa?

source: This book is very new.
She mistook me for my brother.
target: Ella me tomó por mi hermano.

source: We'll rest afterwards.
You're not doing your share.
target: No estás cumpliendo con tu parte.

source: This apple is very red.
They're paying rent.
Tom is visually impaired.
I don't fear death.
target: No le temo a la muerte.

source: Tom owes Mary money.
target: Tomás le adeuda dinero a María.

source: There is a message for you.
How did you enjoy the movie?
Thanks for dinner.
He gripped my hand.
This school is ours.
I used to smoke a lot, but I have given up smoking now.
target: Solía fumar mucho, pero ahora lo he dejado.

source: Do you have any idea who'd want Tom dead?
target: ¿Tienes alguna idea de quién querría a Tom muerto?

source: This one's broken.
I do it once a year.
target: Lo hago una vez al año.

source: It's not as simple as all that.
target: No es tan simple como todo eso.

source: Mary wore a strapless dress to the party.
target: Mary fue a la fiesta con un vestido sin tirantes.

source: Tom is a celebrity.
Don't think about it too much.
He is riding a bicycle.
I didn't mind doing that at all.
I remember your face, but I don't remember your name.
target: Yo recuerdo tu rostro pero no recuerdo tu nombre.

source: Which do you like better, tea or coffee?
target: ¿Qué os gusta más, el té o el café?

source: Don't worry. I told you everything would be OK.
target: No te preocupes. Te dije que todo estaría bien.

source: Here is a present for you in token of our appreciation.
target: Este es un presente como muestra de nuestro agradecimiento.

source: Tom died of a broken heart.
target: Tom murió por un corazón roto.

source: Tom saw Mary and John flirting with each other.
target: Tom vio a Mary y John tonteando entre sí.

source: I have seen her before.
He's offered to help.
You shouldn't've come.
Maybe you're not as stupid as you sound.
target: Puede que no seas tan tonto como pareces.

source: It is clear what must be done.
target: Está claro qué hay que hacer.

source: Your remarks were out of place.
target: Sus comentarios estuvieron fuera de lugar.

source: Tom took three sleeping pills.
target: Tom se tomó tres pastillas para dormir.

source: The notice says, "Danger! 10,000 VOLTS."
He disgraced himself by telling a lie.
target: Él se deshonró al contar una mentira.

source: She explained to him how to solve the puzzle.
target: Ella le explicó cómo resolver el rompecabezas.

source: It's all about having fun.
She refused to speak English.
